content:
# The error indicates that there is no Iron Ore left in our inventory to insert into the Stone Furnace. This is likely because we had already used all the Iron Ore for smelting, and the furnace is now working with the remaining Iron Ore it had.

# The Stone Furnace currently has 7 Iron Ore and 1 Iron Plate produced. Since we have no Iron Ore left in our inventory, we need to gather more Iron Ore to continue the smelting process.

# Let's go back to the nearest Iron Ore resource patch to gather more Iron Ore.

# 1. Locate the nearest Iron Ore resource patch again
iron_ore_position = nearest(Resource.IronOre)

# 2. Move to the Iron Ore resource patch
move_to(iron_ore_position)

# 3. Harvest a quantity of Iron Ore. We will harvest 10 for now.
harvest_resource(iron_ore_position, quantity=10)
print(f"Inventory changed to {inspect_inventory()}")  # Check inventory after harvesting Iron Ore.
